mapper.insert: insert into w_spu (spu_id, spu_title, spu_sontitle, spu_state, spu_addtime, spu_pc, spu_sc, spu_describe, spu_specification, spu_recommend) values (#{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spuSontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spuState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuAddtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{spuPc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuSc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spuSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spuRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update w_spu set spu_title = #{spuTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spu_sontitle = #{spuSontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spu_state = #{spuState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spu_addtime = #{spuAddtime,jdbcType=DATE}, spu_pc = #{spuPc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spu_sc = #{spuSc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spu_describe = #{spuDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spu_specification = #{spuSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spu_recommend = #{spuRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER} where spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select spu_id, spu_title, spu_sontitle, spu_state, spu_addtime, spu_pc, spu_sc, spu_describe, spu_specification, spu_recommend from w_spu where spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
